hero.title: AI for Everyone
hero.subtitle: Kerala
hero.description: Empowering every person in God's Own Country to explore, learn, and thrive in the age of artificial intelligence. From students to seniors, farmers to artists—AI belongs to all of us.

story.title: A Human Story from Kerala
story.subtitle: AI isn't just about technology—it's about people, dreams, and possibilities
story.card1Desc: Making AI accessible to everyone, regardless of technical background or location
story.card2Desc: Rooted in Kerala's culture, reflecting our values and community spirit
story.card3Desc: Human-centered AI that serves real needs and solves real problems
story.card4Desc: Encouraging curiosity, learning, and hands-on experimentation with AI

empower.title: Empowering Every Person
empower.subtitle: See how AI creates opportunities across Kerala's communities
empower.studentDesc: AI tutors help with homework, explain complex topics, and personalize learning paths
empower.farmerDesc: Weather predictions, crop health monitoring, and market insights at their fingertips
empower.artisanDesc: Design tools, marketing support, and global reach for traditional crafts
empower.seniorDesc: Voice assistants, health reminders, and staying connected with loved ones

demo.title: Try AI Yourself
demo.subtitle: Ask a question in English or Malayalam
demo.ex1: What crops should I plant in Palakkad this month?
demo.ex2: Explain robotics to a 10-year-old in Malayalam
demo.ex3: How can AI help my small business?

timeline.title: Kerala's AI Journey
timeline.subtitle: From digital pioneers to AI innovators
timeline.phase1Desc: Kerala became India's first fully digitally literate state
timeline.phase2Desc: Infopark and startups put Kerala on the tech map
timeline.phase3Desc: Government initiatives to bring AI to every district
timeline.phase4Desc: Makerspaces, workshops, and grassroots AI education
timeline.phase5Desc: AI-powered healthcare, agriculture, and sustainable development

testimonials.title: Voices from Kerala
testimonials.subtitle: Real people, real stories of AI transformation
testimonials.student: As a student in Kochi, AI helps me learn at my own pace. It's like having a tutor available 24/7!
testimonials.farmer: Weather predictions and pest alerts have saved my crops. Technology finally speaks our language.
testimonials.teacher: Teaching with AI tools has made my classroom more engaging. Every child gets individual attention.
testimonials.senior: Voice commands help me stay connected with my grandchildren. Age is just a number now!

responsible.title: Responsible AI for Kerala
responsible.subtitle: Building trust through ethics, transparency, and safety
responsible.privacyDesc: Your information stays yours. No personal data collected without consent.
responsible.fairnessDesc: AI that works for everyone, regardless of background or ability.
responsible.transparencyDesc: Clear explanations of how AI makes decisions and recommendations.
responsible.safetyDesc: AI as guidance, not replacement. Human judgment always matters.

activities.title: Try These AI Activities
activities.subtitle: Simple projects to start your AI journey
activities.project1Desc: Use AI image tools to design a poster about Kerala's heritage
activities.project1Step1: Choose a Kerala landmark or festival
activities.project1Step2: Describe it to an AI image generator
activities.project2: Write an AI Poem in Malayalam
activities.project2Desc: Collaborate with AI to create Malayalam poetry
activities.project2Step1: Pick a theme: monsoon, backwaters, or family
activities.project2Step2: Ask AI to write verses in Malayalam
activities.project3Desc: Learn how AI can process and explain information
activities.project3Step1: Find a Malayalam news article online
activities.project3Step2: Ask AI to summarize key points
activities.project3Step3: Compare AI summary with your understanding

build.title: How AI Helped Build This Website
build.subtitle: Transparency in action—our AI-assisted creation process
build.intro: This website wasn't built by AI alone, but AI was an invaluable partner throughout. Here's how:
build.brainstormDesc: AI helped generate ideas for storytelling structure, section flow, and Kerala-specific themes
build.contentDesc: Initial drafts, educational explanations, and accessibility text were AI-assisted
build.translationDesc: AI provided translations that were then refined by native speakers for cultural accuracy
build.codeDesc: Component structures, animation logic, and responsive layouts generated with AI support
build.designDesc: Color palettes, typography choices, and Kerala-inspired visual elements proposed by AI
build.accessibilityDesc: Alt text, ARIA labels, and keyboard navigation patterns suggested by AI
build.iterationDesc: AI helped identify improvements, optimize performance, and refine user experience
build.conclusion: The result is a collaboration between human creativity and AI capability—showing what's possible when technology serves people.

footer.tagline: Making AI accessible, ethical, and inspiring for all of Kerala
